Apple recommends this as well: You should specify copy as the property attribute, because a block needs to be copied to keep track of its captured state outside of the original scope. This isnâ€™t something you need to worry about when using Automatic Reference Counting, as it will happen automatically, but itâ€™s best practice for the property attribute to show the resultant behavior.
